name: Authentic Russian Salad 'Olivye'
author: lovefullofpie
summary: This is a recipe my mom and grandmother use every time there's a family gathering or a special occasion. To make this a vegetarian dish just leave out the ham. Potatoes, carrots, and eggs do not have to be chilled completely after boiling. Dill can be substituted for parsley if desired.
ingredients: ½ cup cubed fully cooked ham, or to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste  (Optional)
½ cup mayonnaise, or to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil; add potatoes and carrot
Return mixture to a boil and add eggs; cook until potatoes are tender, 20 to 30 minutes
Chop potatoes and carrot; peel and chop eggs
Mix potatoes, carrot, eggs, pickles, peas, ham, and parsley together in a large bowl; stir in mayonnaise until salad is evenly coated
